recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Delicious pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and bacon
recipes.ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, Parmesan cheese, bacon, black pepper
recipes.cookingInstructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente, whisk eggs and cheese, fry bacon until crispy, mix all together and serve hot

recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Delicious pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil leaves.
recipes.cookingInstructions:
1. Roll out the pizza dough. 
2. Top with sliced tomatoes and mozzarella. 
3. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 
4. Bake in a preheated oven until golden and bubbly. 
5. Garnish with fresh basil leaves. 
6. Slice and serve hot.

recipes.name: Creamy Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with succulent garlic butter shrimp.
recipes.cookingInstructions:
1. Cook linguine pasta until al dente. 
2. In a skillet, melt butter and sauté minced garlic. 
3. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 
4. Pour in heavy cream and simmer until thickened. 
5. Toss the cooked pasta in the sauce. 
6. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper. 
7. Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.description: Healthy and refreshing grilled chicken salad.
recipes.cookingInstructions:
1. Season chicken breast with salt and black pepper. 
2. Grill until cooked through. 
3. Chop lettuce, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion. 
4. Slice the grilled chicken. 
5. In a bowl, whisk together olive oil and lemon juice to make the dressing. 
6. Toss the salad ingredients with the dressing. 
7. Top with grilled chicken slices. 
8. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with rich tomato meat sauce.
recipes.cookingInstructions:
1. Cook spaghetti until al dente. 
2. In a pan, sauté chopped onion and minced garlic. 
3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 
4. Stir in canned tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, beef broth, oregano, and basil. 
5. Simmer the sauce until thickened. 
6. Season with salt and black pepper to taste. 
7. Serve the Bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti. 
8. Garnish with grated parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Roasted Vegetables Quinoa Bowl
recipes.description: Nutritious and colorful quinoa bowl with roasted vegetables.
recipes.cookingInstructions:
1. Cook quinoa according to package instructions. 
2. Preheat the oven and roast sweet potato, zucchini, bell peppers, and red onion with olive oil, cumin, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. 
3. In a bowl, assemble the quinoa and roasted vegetables. 
4. Top with sliced avocado and fresh cilantro. 
5. Serve as a nutritious and satisfying quinoa bowl.
